item.title: Differentially Private Stochastic Gradient Descent with Fixed-Size Minibatches: Tighter RDP Guarantees with or without Replacement
item.description: Tighter differential privacy (RDP) guarantees for DP-SGD with fixed-size minibatches are achieved, improving private deep learning model training.
